name: AmIforgetting
0:
”Alexa, open Am I forgetting”
”Alexa, Am I forgetting”
”Alexa, launch Am I forgetting”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: am i forgetting
Developer Terms of Use
des: We often forget our cell phone or wallet or to turn off the lights when we go out. This skill reminds you to take all the things you are going to need. Just say am i forgetting and we will remind you
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
